text: The Colour Group (Great Britain) is a registered charity based in the United Kingdom. It was founded in 1940 as in interdisciplinary society concerned with all aspects of colour, such as its measurement, perception, and reproduction.Information about The Colour Group. It organises monthly meetings, mainly in London, and an annual exhibition.The Colour Group Annual Exhibition 2007, The Royal Photographic Society, 2007. == References == == External links == * The Colour Group website Category:Organizations established in 1940 Category:Color organizations Category:Learned societies of the United Kingdom Category:Charities based in London
title: The Colour Group
